covid_data_handler module¶

This module handles the collecting and processing of covid data from the API

covid_data_handler.covid_API_request(location: str = 'Exeter', location_type: str = 'ltla') → dict¶

This function returns live data from the uk-covid19 API.

Args:

location (str, optional): Location of data needed from API. Defaults to data[“location”]. location_type (str, optional): Type of location need from APi. Defaults to data[“location_type”].

Returns:

dict: Filtered data from covid-19 API

covid_data_handler.data_gatherer() → list¶

This function gathers covid data needed from different functions and puts it in a list.

Returns:

list: Covid data including local 7 days, national 7 days, hospital cases and total deaths

covid_data_handler.hospital_cases_extract() → int¶

This function extracts the total hospital cases from the covid-api dictionary.

Returns:

int: Covid hospital cases

covid_data_handler.local_7_days_extract() → int¶

This function extracts and calculates the local cases over the past 7 days from the covid-api dictionary.

Returns:

int: Total local covid cases over past 7 days

covid_data_handler.national_7_days_extract() → int¶

This function extracts and calculates the national cases over the past 7 days from the covid-api dictionary.

Returns:

int: Total national covid cases over past 7 days

covid_data_handler.parse_csv_data(csv_filename: str) → list¶

This function reads from a csv file and returns the content as a list.

Args:

csv_filename (str): Name of csv file to be opened

Returns:

list: Content of csv file

covid_data_handler.process_covid_csv_data(covid_csv_data: list) → tuple¶

This function processes the data from static csv file and returns data about the last 7 days, current hospital cases and total deaths.

Args:

covid_csv_data (list): Content of csv file

Returns:

tuple: Integers representing data about last 7 days cases, current hospital cases and total deaths

covid_data_handler.total_deaths_extract() → int¶

This function extracts the total deaths from the covid-api dictionary.

Returns:

int: Total covid deaths
